trans-unit.source: <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2018-05-17T14:19:47.8100014-05:00" MadCap:creator="NTadajewski0100" MadCap:initials="NT" MadCap:comment="delete topic" MadCap:editor="NTadajewski0100" MadCap:editDate="2018-05-17T14:19:49.7917252-05:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Client Installation</MadCap:annotation>

seg-source.mrk: Client Installation

trans-unit.source: The Installation Wizard for the “cc|formatted documents – Client” must only be run for all Microsoft Dynamics NAV Clients that have a version lower than Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2015 and that should be used for cc|formatted documents. Therefore, if cc|formatted documents is used only in the sales or order department, it is not necessary to install the Microsoft Dynamics NAV Client Layers in the inventory department.

seg-source.mrk: The Installation Wizard for the “cc|formatted documents – Client” must only be run for all Microsoft Dynamics NAV Clients that have a version lower than Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2015 and that should be used for cc|formatted documents.
Therefore, if cc|formatted documents is used only in the sales or order department, it is not necessary to install the Microsoft Dynamics NAV Client Layers in the inventory department.

trans-unit.source: An automated Software Deployment of the Client Software is basically possible.

seg-source.mrk: An automated Software Deployment of the Client Software is basically possible.

trans-unit.source: : Three Tier Architecture

seg-source.mrk: : Three Tier Architecture

trans-unit.source: Requirements

seg-source.mrk: Requirements

trans-unit.source: Requirements for the correct operation of “cc|formatted documents – Client”:

seg-source.mrk: Requirements for the correct operation of “cc|formatted documents – Client”:

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework 3.5 or higher

seg-source.mrk: .NET Framework 3.5 or higher

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Dynamics NAV Client

seg-source.mrk: Microsoft Dynamics NAV Client

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: The “cc|formatted documents – Server” must be installed prior to installing the “cc|formatted documents – Clients” because it provides a (required) service to the clients. Without the server, the clients cannot operate (especially the report output).

seg-source.mrk: The “cc|formatted documents – Server” must be installed prior to installing the “cc|formatted documents – Clients” because it provides a (required) service to the clients.
Without the server, the clients cannot operate (especially the report output).

trans-unit.source: Installing the server includes the following processes:

seg-source.mrk: Installing the server includes the following processes:

trans-unit.source: Run the file “cc formatted documents <NAV Version ID> - Client Setup.msi”.

seg-source.mrk: Run the file “cc formatted documents <NAV Version ID> - Client Setup.msi”.

trans-unit.source: Follow the installation wizard (see following pages).

seg-source.mrk: Follow the installation wizard (see following pages).

trans-unit.source: Follow the configuration wizard (see following pages).

seg-source.mrk: Follow the configuration wizard (see following pages).

trans-unit.source: Each process is described in the following sections.

seg-source.mrk: Each process is described in the following sections.

trans-unit.source: Client Installation

seg-source.mrk: Client Installation

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to run the cc|formatted documents client installation:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to run the cc|formatted documents client installation:

trans-unit.source: Locate and run the “cc formatted documents <NAV Version ID> - Client Setup.msi” file to start the installation.

seg-source.mrk: Locate and run the “cc formatted documents <NAV Version ID> - Client Setup.msi” file to start the installation.

trans-unit.source: : cc|formatted documents Client Setup Wizard, Welcome window

seg-source.mrk: : cc|formatted documents Client Setup Wizard, Welcome window

trans-unit.source: Click Next. The information window opens.

seg-source.mrk: Click Next.
The information window opens.

trans-unit.source: : cc|formatted documents Client Setup Wizard, Information window

seg-source.mrk: : cc|formatted documents Client Setup Wizard, Information window

trans-unit.source: Click Next. The License Agreement window opens.

seg-source.mrk: Click Next.
The License Agreement window opens.

trans-unit.source: : cc|formatted documents Client Setup Wizard, License Agreement window

seg-source.mrk: : cc|formatted documents Client Setup Wizard, License Agreement window

trans-unit.source: Accept the License Agreement and then click Next.

seg-source.mrk: Accept the License Agreement and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: : cc|formatted documents Client Setup Wizard, installation folder selection

seg-source.mrk: : cc|formatted documents Client Setup Wizard, installation folder selection

trans-unit.source: Confirm or select the installation folder and then click Next.

seg-source.mrk: Confirm or select the installation folder and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: : cc|formatted documents Client Setup Wizard, settings and features selection

seg-source.mrk: : cc|formatted documents Client Setup Wizard, settings and features selection

trans-unit.source:
Confirm the default setting or (de-)select additional features:
  • The “Report Generator” is a required component of cc|formatted documents. Without the Report Generator an output of formatted content is not possible.
  • The “HTML Editor” is a component that is required for text processing.

seg-source.mrk: Confirm the default setting or (de-)select additional features:
• The “Report Generator” is a required component of cc|formatted documents.
Without the Report Generator an output of formatted content is not possible.
• The “HTML Editor” is a component that is required for text processing.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: If you have purchased the HTML Editor only as a flowtext editor of your Microsoft Dynamics NAV Installation, you can deactivate the Report Generator of cc|formatted documents at this point.

seg-source.mrk: If you have purchased the HTML Editor only as a flowtext editor of your Microsoft Dynamics NAV Installation, you can deactivate the Report Generator of cc|formatted documents at this point.

trans-unit.source:
Click Install. Required files/components are copied and registered.
When the installation is finished, the Installation Complete window opens.

seg-source.mrk: Click Install.
Required files/components are copied and registered.
When the installation is finished, the Installation Complete window opens.

trans-unit.source: When the installation process is finished, click Finish.

seg-source.mrk: When the installation process is finished, click Finish.

trans-unit.source: Configuration Wizard – Client

seg-source.mrk: Configuration Wizard – Client

trans-unit.source: When the installation is complete, the cc|formatted documents - Configuration Wizard window opens. The Wizard assists with setting up the connection to the previously installed “cc|formatted documents – Server”.

seg-source.mrk: When the installation is complete, the cc|formatted documents - Configuration Wizard window opens.
The Wizard assists with setting up the connection to the previously installed “cc|formatted documents – Server”.

trans-unit.source: : cc|formatted documents Client Configuration Wizard, Welcome window

seg-source.mrk: : cc|formatted documents Client Configuration Wizard, Welcome window

trans-unit.source: Click Next. The Product Key window opens.

seg-source.mrk: Click Next.
The Product Key window opens.

trans-unit.source: : cc|formatted documents Client Configuration Wizard, Product Key window

seg-source.mrk: : cc|formatted documents Client Configuration Wizard, Product Key window

trans-unit.source: Enter the company name and the product key provided by COSMO CONSULT.

seg-source.mrk: Enter the company name and the product key provided by COSMO CONSULT.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: The product key is company specific. For companies of affiliated enterprises more product keys are issued free of charge.

seg-source.mrk: The product key is company specific.
For companies of affiliated enterprises more product keys are issued free of charge.

trans-unit.source: Click Next. The Connection Settings window opens.

seg-source.mrk: Click Next.
The Connection Settings window opens.

trans-unit.source: : cc|formatted documents Client Configuration Wizard, Connection Settings window

seg-source.mrk: : cc|formatted documents Client Configuration Wizard, Connection Settings window

trans-unit.source:
Confirm or adjust the address, port and service name of your “cc|formatted documents –Server”:
  • The address of the “cc|formatted documents – Server” (FD Server) corresponds to the network address of the host, on which the “cc|formatted documents – Server” was installed.
  • The FD Port and FD Server Service Name only have to be adjusted if incorrect.

seg-source.mrk: Confirm or adjust the address, port and service name of your “cc|formatted documents –Server”:
• The address of the “cc|formatted documents – Server” (FD Server) corresponds to the network address of the host, on which the “cc|formatted documents – Server” was installed.
• The FD Port and FD Server Service Name only have to be adjusted if incorrect.

trans-unit.source:
Click Next. The Connection Test window opens.
This window provides the ability to test the connection of the “cc|formatted documents – Client” to the “cc|formatted documents – Server”.

seg-source.mrk: Click Next.
The Connection Test window opens.
This window provides the ability to test the connection of the “cc|formatted documents – Client” to the “cc|formatted documents – Server”.

trans-unit.source: : cc|formatted documents Client Setup Wizard, Connection Test window

seg-source.mrk: : cc|formatted documents Client Setup Wizard, Connection Test window

trans-unit.source:
Perform a connection test by clicking Test Connection.
If the connection is established successfully, the “cc|formatted documents – Server” indicates the connection status to Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

seg-source.mrk: Perform a connection test by clicking Test Connection.
If the connection is established successfully, the “cc|formatted documents – Server” indicates the connection status to Microsoft Dynamics NAV.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: The “cc|formatted documents – Server” establishes the connection on demand – therefore it is not crucial if no connection to Microsoft Dynamics NAV exists.

seg-source.mrk: The “cc|formatted documents – Server” establishes the connection on demand – therefore it is not crucial if no connection to Microsoft Dynamics NAV exists.

trans-unit.source: Click Next. The NAV Add-ins window opens.

seg-source.mrk: Click Next.
The NAV Add-ins window opens.

trans-unit.source: : cc|formatted documents Client Configuration Wizard, NAV Add-ins window

seg-source.mrk: : cc|formatted documents Client Configuration Wizard, NAV Add-ins window

trans-unit.source: To use cc|formatted documents in Microsoft Dynamics NAV, the Add-Ins path for Microsoft Dynamics NAV is required.

seg-source.mrk: To use cc|formatted documents in Microsoft Dynamics NAV, the Add-Ins path for Microsoft Dynamics NAV is required.

trans-unit.source: Specify the path to the Add-In Folder of the Microsoft Dynamics NAV Client, which is used for the connection to the correct Microsoft Dynamics NAV Instance and then click Finish to complete the configuration wizard.

seg-source.mrk: Specify the path to the Add-In Folder of the Microsoft Dynamics NAV Client, which is used for the connection to the correct Microsoft Dynamics NAV Instance and then click Finish to complete the configuration wizard.
